original_title: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand (15kg(2kg+2.5kg+3kg Pair)
optimized_title: HEALTH Steel Dumbbells Set with Rack, 15kg Weights Dumbbells Set (2kg, 2.5kg, 3kg Dumbbells Pair), Chrome Silver Hand Weights with Black A-Frame Plastic Stand for Home Gym Weights for women and men

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand (15kg(2kg+2.5kg+3kg Pair))
key_features: Steel dumbbells with chrome or silver ends and black handles
Includes a black A-frame style rack with three tiers
Rack designed to hold three pairs of dumbbells
Weight markings visible on dumbbell ends: 2 No., 2.5 No., 3 No.
Total set weight 15kg (2kg + 2.5kg + 3kg pair) as per listing
Dumbbell rack made from molded plastic/polymer with visible screw fastenings
image_analysis.usage: Strength training and weight workouts at home or in small fitness spaces, using multiple dumbbell weights organized on a compact rack.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners, and individuals seeking a compact dumbbell set with stand for light strength training.
image_analysis.ai_description: A compact dumbbell set featuring three chrome and silver steel pairs marked 2, 2.5 and 3 No., neatly arranged on a black A-frame stand. The molded plastic rack has three curved cradles per side and visible screws, keeping the six sleek, round-ended dumbbells organized and accessible.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Solid steel, chrome/silver dumbbells resist chipping and bending for long-term home use
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap vinyl or sand-filled dumbbells crack, leak or deform after a few months

comparison_points.our_benefit: Black A-frame rack securely cradles all 3 pairs to keep your floor clear and organised
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost sets arrive with no stand, leaving weights scattered and easy to trip over

comparison_points.our_benefit: Clear 2kg, 2.5kg, 3kg markings on steel ends make weight changes fast during workouts
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Budget dumbbells have faint or peeling labels so you constantly pick up the wrong weight

comparison_points.our_benefit: Balanced 15kg range (2–3kg pairs) suits beginners, toning and rehab in one compact set
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Random weight mixes in cheaper sets skip key sizes, limiting smooth progression
